steps.description: Run npm install first and install the dependencies, if you are not running Docker container. If you are running the Docker container, you just need to install the @types repos for local development.
These are the available npm run scripts. You can also run them from NPM Scripts area in VS Code. Use pack or pack:chrome, if you are building the extension for Chrome.
This is the main task for compiling the TypeScript files. The JS files in libraries folder is simply passed through and not compiled. TypeScript files are compiled using ts-loader.

You can also build the extension to a Docker container and have the output mapped to local folder. You need to set this up in Docker Desktop -> Settings -> Resources -> File Sharing. Refer https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-windows/
